person.persName: Benjamin Gratz Bruce (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, grocer)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, grocer and city councilman. Kentucky native. Son of John Bruce and Margaret Ross Hutton Bruce. Married to Louisa A. Chiles Bruce in Estill County, Kentucky, on November 1, 1849. Father of Margaret "Maggie" Bruce and Louisa Bruce. Attended Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky, from 1845 to 1847. Physician in Estill County in 1850. Household owned eighteen enslaved persons in Estill County in 1850. Grocer in Lexington in 1860. Grocer in Fayette County in 1863. Member of the Lexington City Council in 1864.
